# Kernel { #jaxidem.idem.Kernel }

```python
idem.Kernel(self, function, basis=None, params=None, form='expansion')
```

Generic class defining a kernel, or a basis expansion of a kernel with
its parameters.

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [save_plot](#jaxidem.idem.Kernel.save_plot) | Saves a plot of the direction of the kernel. |
| [show_plot](#jaxidem.idem.Kernel.show_plot) | Shows a plot of the direction of the kernel. |

### save_plot { #jaxidem.idem.Kernel.save_plot }

```python
idem.Kernel.save_plot(filename, width=6, height=4, dpi=300, title=None)
```

Saves a plot of the direction of the kernel.

### show_plot { #jaxidem.idem.Kernel.show_plot }

```python
idem.Kernel.show_plot(width=5, height=4)
```

Shows a plot of the direction of the kernel.
